name: Shalena Murphy
text: This place really skimps on portion. A pepperoni and sausage pizza gets 8 slices of pepperoni. This was not a one time deal, it was a regular occurrence. I started going to the other Pizza Hut and would get way more pepperoni than one piece …More

name: Rachel Tolleth
text: Excellent place to eat and have family at. Pizza was delicious and right on time. Server was very friendly and constantly checking to see if everything was good and okay. Recommend for all the pizza lovers

name: Elizabeth Carpenter
text: While the food was good here, and the server was very sweet, the restaurant was a MESS! There was pieces of food all over the floor and the dining room looked unclean. Added to that, each table seemed to have a different type of chair, the …More

name: Justine Case
text: Ordered a pizza at 6:30 it's now 8:10 and still no pizza. Husband called at 7:30 and asked about our food they said they don't have our order even though we got charged. Husband just left to go to the store so that we make sure we get our food. This is the 3rd time this has happened. Won't be eating with Pizza hut ever again.

name: Ben Hunt
text: There were tons of flies in the building. It was disgusting to know they don't have a clean environment. Made me wonder what the back of the restraunt was like. Ruined pizza hut pizza for me I don't like to have to worry about eating flies or their many other nasty fly byproducts.

name: Devri Larson
text: FILTHY! I took my family there yesterday and was completely surprised at how filthy the entire restaurant was. We sat down and the table had been wiped clean so there was no crumbs, however, it was a gray color. Having a 1 year old in a …More

name: Ashley Hendricks
text: Worst customer service I've had in a very long time. I made an online order and then 10 minutes later was called to say they no longer have one of the items I had selected, redid the order walked into the store and was completely ignored by …More

name: Jessica Pierce
text: Service was horrible. Served full drink to a toddler, failed to cut cheese sticks and pizza, appetizer arrived after pizza, and we never received our bill. The waiter never checked on his customers or established a concern in their product. …More

name: Jennifer Franklin
text: We had an excellent waitress and the food was hot and delicious. The only thing they could improve on is bringing out the appetizer a few minutes earlier so that it's not intruding on the time of the main meal.

name: Anonymous America
text: Our server was very polite. She was quick and did good. HOWEVER.... trying to eat while you have 200 flys landing on your face, drink, food.... WOW! Each booth had a dozen flies... Nasty! We politely asked for our check after 3 minutes of fighting them off. Worst I have ever seen! Must handle that!

name: Dave W
text: The service is slow, the way they treat their customers is slightly below average for the magic valley, which is never good, and the atmosphere is...well...dingy.  It is one of those places where you feel like they haven't updated since they 90s, and you feel slightly greasy afterwards.  The food was good though.

name: Eric Harshberger
text: Fun, old school (90's) styling with a nice menu, salad bar, & server.  Looks like th ere is a good group room too.

name: Dan Choma
text: I haven't had pizza hut in a while and now I remember why. The pizza was greasy and heavy, the breadsticks were greasy. The place was empty and the table felt sticky and kind of dirty. I went away disappointed and feeling a bit yucky

name: Kerri Barton
text: Well to start off...two other tables got their food before us.. an we were here way before they even ordered. .. relieved pizza before the garlic bread... and pizza  had no cheese in the middle of pizza just burnt crust... I will never come back here!

name: Delmas Ingram
text: Worst Pizza Hut ever!! New location but staff is sub par!! They slammed a competitor!! Not impressed  I got back to where I was staying and my pizza want even what I payed for!!

name: Chris Turner
text: Ordered a well done pizza and the cheese was not even melted all the way. Cold center had to finish baking at my house. Would not recommend this location

name: Tristan Tuttle
text: Walked in and had multiple employees pass us while waiting to be seated and they said nothing. Terrible service you should always greet your customers.

name: Katie Moore
text: Won't be ordering from pizza hut after tonight this has happen to us more than once where it has been way pass the time of delivery well this time it was 40 to 50 min pass delivery and they only brought us half our order we sent it back and now have to wait for a refund. I should of learned my lesson the first time.

name: Mandy McCloskey
text: We waited for 10 minutes to be seated! There were 2 other customers in the restaurant. Our waitress was EXTREMELY rude. We were incorrectly informed about the specials so our bill was $5.00 more then it should have been. We waited another …More

name: Brandon Murphy
text:
I regret coming here.

Terrible service, terrible food, nasty bathrooms. …More

name: micah bennett
text: Had a large group they did you pretty good job serving..

name: Riley Howell
text: Not sure why all the bad reviews I ate there today and everything was as expected and on time. Nicole helped me and was very friendly and helpful.

name: jack frost
text: I just went and had the crappiest pizza iv ever had at this location. I ordered 2 large 2 topping pizzas that were mostly cheese with the faintest amount of toppings.i hate plain ass cheese pizza

name: Sheila Graham
text: Ordered Fiesta pizza (taco pizza) and it came with huge chunks of ice burg lettuce and we pulled off a whole paper towel full of brown lettuce and showed it to the waitress the manager didn't want to come out to talk about it, they …More

name: Martin Molesworth
text: Nice and friendly and service was quick

name: Jonnie De La Cruz
text: Great pizza, great place to have a casual lunch or dinner.

name: Joshua Bowyer
text: Waited for 50 minutes. Only one other table with 5 people. Not the best business for a 6pm supper on a Saturday night. Ordered a Super Supreme with pan crust. Came ulta thin and dripping grease. Minimal toppings. My family eats ALOT of …More

name: Annalyse Owens
text: Terrible service. Dirty floors.  Dirty tables everywhere. DISGUSTING bathrooms!! And the food took forever even though the table that was seated just seconds before us had their food within minutes.

name: Whittney Martinez
text: Pizzas good but more expensive then I wanna pay, I ordered for pizzas and a 2 litter of soda $80! Next time I'm going somewhere else sorry Pizza hut, love the pizza not the price!

name: Mary Frances Brooks
text: They had really good customer service. Our delivery was late, the delivery guy appogizing and explained that there was a mix up of our order with someone else's. So to make up for being late the gave us another pizza for free!!

name: Chris Colon
text: Would give this 0 stars if I could. I called in an order to the Addison st Pizza Hut thinking it was the blue lakes one, and when I arrived there were no employees. I waited …More

name: Brandon Longoria
text: They always have a friendly staff every time we go it makes u want to go back bc u know there will b a smile on the face that server u!!!

name: D Lamm
text: Order correct and ready when arrived

name: Tevin Dahl
text: Terrible customer service, have to wait several minutes for an employee to even come take my order. Unacommdating and rude, save your time and energy and just go to the Pizza Hut on addison

name: Letticia Gutierrez
text: Always cold pizza regardless if it's carryout or delivery. The employees I had to deal with where rude and untrained, my order was wrong 3 times and they gave us turned marinara sauce. Dominos on the other hand is amazing here in Twinky Falls. You suck Twin Falls Pizza Hut! I miss you SLC Pizza Hut!

name: Heidi Belieu
text: Wonderful food and greatly priced....

name: Shawn Storms
text: Great fresh hot tasty food dining room was clean our server Crisa was prompt nice friendly very cheerful and smiling my dining experience was wonderful I will definitely go back

name: Amy Winters
text: Salad bar was bad. Nothing on it except wilted vegetables. Sad.

name: Not Stephen Jackson
text: My mom, my brother and I ordered from here. My mom and I got sick and my mom even puked. She called her friend and he said that it gave him food poisoning also. Food was delicious, what the food did to us wasn't.

name: Emma Smith
text: Awful food. Awful service. Waited 45 minutes for an appetizer. The plates we were given were absolutely disgusting with food still on them.

name: Zac Abrams
text: It was a great place before it closed

name: Jamie Stewart
text: Our pizza was really greasy and the crust tastes stale.  So disappointed in it .

text: Sticky tables, old school style makes it feel ghetto, 2 employees were slacking off when we walked in, pizza was greasy and took forever
